emuInput.TitMainTitle: Music instructor Carl McVicker standing with Westinghouse High School string quartet, from left: Patricia Prattis (Jennings), Paul Ross, June Gibson, and Barbara Jones, gathered on stage with music stands and sheet music, another version
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 3, 1958, pg. 4A reads: "State Champions - The above youngsters from Westinghouse High School went to the contests of the Pennsylvania Forensic and Music League in Harrisburg last Friday and "brought home the bacon" as the best string quartet in competing secondary schools in state. They won a "superior" rating.  Left to right: Patricia Prattis, first violin; Paul Ross, second violin; June Gibson, cello, and Barbara Jones, viola.  Standing is Carl McVicker, music instructor at Westinghouse. - Harris Photo."
